body:
Welcome to Moving Memory.

***I love this game. Super addictive***
***Great memory game!***
***Realy funny way to practice memory***

Check out this brand new memory game!
Train your brain to increase your memory power.

Itâ€™s easy. Watch and memorize the moving objects.
Then tap in the next scene the objects in the right order as quickly as possible.

Key features
Simple and intuitive interface
3 modes with different levels of difficulties
Funny graphics
Great sounds and music
Challenging for all ages
